casebody.data:
VAN REYPEN
v.
TEETER. No. 84PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2006. Charles M. Viser, Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, Fred P. Parker, IV, for Van Reypen Associates, Inc. Isaac T. Avery, III, Raleigh, for NC Asso. Police Attorneys. Kimberly N. Overton, for NC Conference of DA. Christopher G. Browning, Solicitor General, for Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of July 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Gerald Teeter, et al.) shall have up to and including the 9th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By *290order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of July 2006."
